name: Windows 7 Boot Updater Skin
summary: A BS7 file is a skin created by Windows 7 Boot Updater, a third-party program used to edit the appearance of Windows 7's boot screen. It contains setting used to adjust the boot screen's background, images, and animations. BS7 files may also include replacement text for the boot screen's Starting Windows and Â© Microsoft Corporation messages.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
